vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
σχοιν-ισμός, ὁ,
measurement of land, [Refs 2nd c.BC+]; as a form of hard labour, [Refs 1st c.AD+]
__II = {σχοίνισμα} [Refs]allotment, [LXX]
vocabInfos.shortDef: a piece of measured out land
vocabInfos.mediumDef: a piece of measured out land
vocabInfos.stepGloss: a piece of measured out land
